qas.question: What is the population of the Alpine region?
What does the economy consist of on the rim of the mountains?
Farming and Forestry continue to be a mainstay of what?

context: The population of the region is <a0_0>14 million<a0_0/> spread across eight countries. On the rim of the mountains, on the plateaus and the plains the economy consists of <a1_0>manufacturing and service jobs<a1_0/> whereas in the higher altitudes and in the mountains farming is still essential to the economy. Farming and forestry continue to be mainstays of <a2_0>Alpine culture<a2_0/>, industries that provide for export to the cities and maintain the mountain ecology.
